Head.title: My Portfolio
Head.description: This is my personal portfolio where I share my projects and experiences.

1.name: Introduction to Web Development 2
1.description: This course covers the basics of programming using Python. Students will learn about variables, control structures, functions, and error handling.

1.title: Personal Portfolio Website
1.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

2.title: Responsive Blog Template
2.description: A responsive blog template designed for mobile and desktop, utilizing modern web design principles.

2.name: Introduction to Programming
2.description: This course introduces students to web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It focuses on creating responsive and accessible websites.

1.title: E-commerce Website
1.description: An e-commerce website with product listings, a shopping cart, and checkout functionality, built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.

2.title: Task Management App
2.description: A task management application to help users organize their tasks and projects, featuring user authentication and data persistence.
